aboutPage.mainText: As a dedicated full-stack developer with a strong design sensibility, I empower brands to excel in the digital landscape.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.body: At the core of our approach, we believe that performance and user experience are inextricably linked. Our expertise lies in crafting dynamic, responsive digital interfaces that not only look exceptional but also perform seamlessly across all devices and platforms. We provide comprehensive guidance and adhere to industry best practices, ensuring that every project delivers a consistent, high-quality user experience.

list.title: Tech Stack
list.body: Figma, HTML, CSS,  Sass, TailwindCSS Javascript, Typescript, ReactJS, NextJS, Shadcn/ui, MUI, Storybook, Webpack, WordPress, Elementor, JQuery, GSAP.

projectPage.mainTitle: I bring your boldest ideas to life

contactPage.body: I'd love to learn more about you and what we can design and build together.
